Description:
Summary:The Tele Sales of the P2P Trading Platform is responsible for generating leads and closing sales for our P2P trading platform. You will be responsible for qualifying leads, conducting demos, and answering customer questions. You will also be responsible for building relationships with potential clients and nurturing them through the sales process.Responsibilities:Qualify leads by assessing their needs and understanding their pain points.
Conduct demos of our P2P trading platform to potential clients.
Answer customer questions about our platform and services.
Build relationships with potential clients and nurture them through the sales process.
Close sales and meet or exceed sales goals.Benefits:Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity to work with a leading P2P trading platform.
Chance to make a real impact on the company's growth.
Collaborative and supportive work environment.
If you are a highly motivated and results-oriented individual with a passion for sales, we encourage you to apply for the Tele Sales of P2P Trading Platform position.Skills
Skills:
Being fluent in Hindi and English is mandatory
Bachelor's degree in business or a related field.
2+ years of experience in sales or a related field.
Strong understanding of P2P trading platforms.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong customer service skills.
Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
Mandatory fluency in Hindi and English.
Smooth communicator with a command of engaging the end customer.
Excellent in pitching ideas and convincing people through fluent interactions.
